name: Splash Brothers Caricature Gray T-Shirt
description: It's raining threes!! Our first release. Support the Golden State Warriors with these one-of-a-kind Splash Brothers caricature t-shirts, featuring custom artwork of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson. High quality screen printed on heather gray American Apparel 100% fine jersey cotton unisex tees. Looks great on men, women, and children! Also available in white. Chest widths S:18" M:20" L:22" XL:24". Slightly fitted, order one size larger for a baggier fit. Our model here is 5'8" 165 lbs and is wearing a size Medium. Ships within 1-4 business days with USPS First-Class Shipment. Don't see what you like? We really appreciate your feedback. Please tell us here to help us improve. Thanks for visiting Bay Area Lineup.
